Establishes a basic MCP graph S3 class, `mcp_graph`. Here is an example usage

```{r}
library(graphicalMCP)

g <- rbind(
  c( 0, .5, .5),
  c(.5,  0, .5),
  c(.5, .5,  0)
)
w <- rep(.333333, 3)

g_dose <- mcp_graph(g, w, paste("dose", letters[1:3]))

g_dose
```
